1.title: Are You Ready for Some Zombies?
1.plot: While investigating the murder of a Seattle Seahawk superfan, Liv has a surprising vision; Major mentors young, homeless zombies; Ravi carries a torch for Peyton; Blaine deals with a threat looming from his past.

2.title: Blue Bloody
2.plot: Liv eats the brain of a despicable dowager and she must determine which of her disgruntled servants killed her. Clive and Bozzio work on their relationship.

3.title: Brainless in Seattle, Part 1
3.plot: Love is in the air after Liv eats the brains of a hopeless romantic, and she can't stop herself from meddling in Clive's relationship. Major and Liv continue to try to work through their differences. Meanwhile, Blaine is approached with an interesting offer.

4.title: Brainless in Seattle, Part 2
4.plot: Liv and Clive discover the murder they are investigating was the work of a serial killer. Meanwhile, Major enters dangerous territory.

5.title: Goon Struck
5.plot: Liv stumbles onto Chase Graves' evil plan while investigating the murder of a hockey player; Major has to make a horrible decision; Peyton attempts to control a volatile situation.

6.title: My Really Fair Lady
6.plot: With no murders for the week, Liv sates her hunger with a musical theater brain. Ravi makes a huge sacrifice for Peyton. Blaine gets a surprise.

7.title: Don't Hate the Player, Hate the Brain
7.plot: After consuming the brain of a bachelor playboy, Liv heads to a club to meet up with Clive and Ravi. Meanwhile, Major is assigned an enormous task. Lastly, Clive is still struggling with the arrangement he's made with Bozzio.

8.title: Chivalry is Dead
8.plot: Liv consumes the brain of a murdered live action role playing knight to solve his murder; Peyton uncovers a truth about Liv; Major embarks on a mission.

9.title: Mac-Liv-Moore
9.plot: Liv consumes the brain of a rapper to find out who shot him. Meanwhile, Seattle is locked down as Fillmore-Graves searches for a serial zombie killer.

10.title: Yipee Ki Brain, Motherscratcher!
10.plot: Liv consumes the brain of a vice detective and her newfound recklessness causes trouble.

11.title: Insane in the Germ Brain
11.plot: Liv consumes a germaphobe's brain during flu season. Ravi acts as a surrogate father to Isobel.

12.title: You've Got to Hide Your Liv Away
12.plot: Major tries to stop Liv from sacrificing herself. Meanwhile, in Liv's absence, a flamboyant Ravi partners with Clive.

13.title: And He Shall Be a Good Man
13.plot: Clive (Malcolm Goodwin), Ravi (Rahul Kohli), Peyton (Aly Michalka) and Major (Robert Buckley) work together to help a bound and gagged Liv (Rose McIver). David Anders and Robert Knepper also star.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Olivia "Liv" Moore was a rosy-cheeked, disciplined, over-achieving medical resident who had her life path completely mapped out, until the night she attended a party that unexpectedly turned into a zombie feeding frenzy. Now as one of the newly undead, Liv has devised a clever way to resist her baser urges to devour fresh human brains - she's taken a job in the Seattle coroner's office. In this appropriately dead-end job, Liv can secretly snack on the brains of the many Jane and John Doe corpses that make a final stop in the morgue.

2.title: Brother, Can You Spare a Brain?
2.plot: Liv and Clive work together to solve the mysterious death of a well known painter.

3.title: The Exterminator
3.plot: Liv and Babineaux learn the victim in a hit and run was the killer in one of Peyton's cases.

4.title: Liv and Let Clive
4.plot: Clive refuses Liv's help when one of his former criminal contacts is murdered.

5.title: Flight of the Living Dead
5.plot: Liv must eat the brains of her murdered sorority sister in order to gain insight about the crime.

6.title: Virtual Reality Bites
6.plot: Liv inherits agoraphobia -- and computer gaming skills -- after eating a hacker's brain.

7.title: Maternity Liv
7.plot: When a pregnant woman dies, Liv develops a strong maternal instinct from eating her brain.

8.title: Dead Air
8.plot: Liv gains insight after eating the brains of a talk show host who specialized in relationships.

9.title: Patriot Brains
9.plot: Liv and Clive investigate the death of a former sniper; Major gets closer to the truth.

10.title: Mr. Berserk
10.plot: A journalist working on a story linking psychotic episodes with an energy drink is murdered.

11.title: Astroburger
11.plot: A person close to Major dies of an apparent suicide; a secret computer file comes to light.

12.title: Dead Rat, Live Rat, Brown Rat, White Rat
12.plot: After a group of drunken teenagers cover up an accident, one of them is murdered.

13.title: Blaine's World
13.plot: Liv and Clive discover new evidence in the Max Rager case and go see Vaughn Du Clark.

1.title: Grumpy Old Liv
1.plot: Liv eats a cantankerous old man's brain to learn the details of his death; Ravi thinks Major is experiencing a side effect of the cure; Liv visits Blaine.

2.title: Zombie Bro
2.plot: Liv eats the brain of a murdered, hard-partying fraternity brother; Ravi asks Major to come with him as he searches desperately for the cure; Blaine meets with a mysterious person from his past.

3.title: Real Dead Housewife of Seattle
3.plot: Liv eats the brains of a trophy wife who was pushed to her death from her home's balcony by a hired hit man; Liv and Ravi discover Peyton is back in Seattle.

4.title: Even Cowgirls Get the Black and Blues
4.plot: During an investigation, Liv consumes the brain of a country-singing waitress; Blaine tries to reunite with a former business associate; Ravi is thrown by Peyton's return; Major's downward spiral continues.

5.title: Love & Basketball
5.plot: Liv, Babineaux and Ravi investigate a peewee coach's death; Liv gives Major a pep talk; Blaine and Ravi work together on the cure; Suzuki's widow visits Babineaux.

6.title: Max Wager
6.plot: Liv unwittingly crosses paths with the most dangerous man in Seattle, a slimy crime lord named Stacey Boss, while investigating the murder of degenerate gambler Harry. Detective Babineaux has a super-fan moment when he and Liv question NBA Hall of Famer Calvin Owens at Harry's funeral. Meanwhile, Blaine's father makes a huge discovery about his son, and Ravi delivers some bad news. Also, Major continues to struggle with his reluctant role of being a zombie killer for Max Rager Corp.

7.title: Abra Cadaver
7.plot: When a macabre celebrity magician is killed while attending a magic conference, Liv must eat his brain to figure out which of his many rivals or detractors killed him. Detective Babineaux and the rest of Liv's friends are treated to a goth-magician version of her that no one truly enjoys. Meanwhile, Blaine comes to Liv seeking her help in stopping whoever is killing zombies. Can she unmask the murderers, and then make them disappear (right into a jail cell) or will she be the one getting sawed in half?

8.title: The Hurt Stalker
8.plot: Babineaux arrives at a crime scene only to discover the murder victim was an ex of his who had been stalking him, making him the primary suspect; Major struggles to deal with Liv on stalker brains.

9.title: Cape Town
9.plot: Mr. Boss is in the picture as Liv gets super-hero brains. Major gets some real insight into zombie functioning. Ravi gets more desperate to find a cure for zombies.

10.title: Method Head
10.plot: Liv and Clive visit the set of a popular TV show to find out who killed one of the main characters.

11.title: Fifty Shades of Grey Matter
11.plot: Things become interesting for Liv when she and Clive investigate the murder of a young librarian who was secretly a writer of erotic fiction. Meanwhile, things heat up between Blaine and someone quite unexpected, and Major is hit with an unforeseen snag in his plan.

12.title: Physician, Heal Thy Selfie
12.plot: Detective Babineaux and Liv are investigating a triple homicide, and Liv is shocked to learn that the victims' bodies are missing their heads. A very hungry Liv is forced to consume the brain of an unfortunate social media-hungry soul who was recently run over by a bus. Meanwhile, Peyton leans on Ravi for support, and things get interesting when Blaine's worlds start to collide.

13.title: The Whopper
13.plot: Liv investigates the murder of Big Fish, a pathological liar. After chewing down a brain burger, she see-saws between spouting truth and lies the whole episode.

14.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Caffeinated Mind
14.plot: The death of the owner of Ravi's favorite coffee shop, 'Positivity', leaves Liv seeing the bright side to everything around her. Meanwhile, the newly found tainted Utopium has unexpected effects on the latest guinea pig. Blaine finds himself in a sticky situation and Liv makes an important discovery about her room mate.

15.title: He Blinded Me... With Science
15.plot: While investigating the murder of a research scientist who was recently demoted at her job, Liv and Detective Babineaux are shocked to learn where she had been employed. Meanwhile, Blaine pays Ravi a visit at the morgue, and Liv discovers something new about Drake. Lastly, Vaughn du Clark confronts Major.

16.title: Pour Some Sugar, Zombie
16.plot: Liv consumes the brain of a recently murdered stripper and uncovers some extremely useful information. Meanwhile, Blaine isn't quite himself lately, and Ravi makes a startling discovery. Lastly, Major and Ravi are helping Peyton move back in with Liv when she receives a surprising phone call.

17.title: Reflections of the Way Liv Used to Be
17.plot: Liv and detective Babineaux are investigating the murder of Bailey Barker, a type-A, ambitious, hyper-competitive and driven student near the top of her class. After consuming Bailey's brain, Liv becomes very much like the girl she was before becoming a zombie.

18.title: Dead Beat
18.plot: Liv and Ravi are in need of help and find an unlikely ally in Blaine. Detective Babineaux and Dale Bozzio pursue a new lead on an old case. Meanwhile, when Major finds himself in a world of trouble, sleazebag Brant Stone comes to his rescue. Vaughn's evil side reaches a whole new level of mean.

19.title: Salivation Army
19.plot: Working together on a mission, Liv, Detective Babineaux and Major crash Vaughn's Super Max Rager party, where singer Rob Thomas performs a song from his solo repertoire. Meanwhile, Blaine reaches out to Peyton for help, which does not sit well with Ravi.

1.title: Heaven Just Got a Little Bit Smoother
1.plot: Liv has discovered there are more zombies living in Seattle than she previously believed. In fact, there's a private military contractor employing a small zombie army, and that army is preparing for the day humans learn of their existence. Major was exonerated for the crimes of the Chaos Killer, but is still considered a pariah. He manages to land a job with the one and only place that will hire him. Meanwhile, Blaine is accused of lying.

2.title: Zombie Knows Best
2.plot: When Liv, Clive and Ravi arrive at the scene to investigate a fatal car accident, they begin to suspect foul play was involved. Both starving, Liv and Major consume the brains of the accident victims, a well-meaning father and his angsty teenage daughter. Meanwhile, when Clive is brought in for questioning about a family that was murdered, he's forced to reveal his past history with them. Lastly, Peyton extends an olive branch to Ravi, and Major hits a road block in his search for Natalie.

3.title: Eat, Pray, Liv
3.plot: To help Clive solve the murder of a lifestyle guru, Liv consumes his brain and takes on his zen approach to life. Ravi's old boss, Katty Kupps, is getting closer to discovering the truth while also getting closer to Ravi. Meanwhile, Blaine and Peyton continue their budding friendship, much to Ravi's dismay. Lastly, Major is struggling a bit at his new job.

4.title: Wag the Tongue Slowly
4.plot: Clive's patience is tested when Liv consumes the brain of a murder victim who had the reputation of being the ultimate office gossip. Meanwhile, Blaine and Peyton continue to grow closer as they wait to see if Ravi (Rahul Kohli) is able to reverse the effects of the cure. Lastly, Major is one step away from fulfilling a promise.

5.title: Spanking the Zombie
5.plot: When Liv consumes the brains of a dominatrix, her bossy and controlling personality makes everyone a little uncomfortable, especially Clive. Meanwhile, Blaine and Peyton have a heart-to-heart.

6.title: Some Like It Hot Mess
6.plot: Liv becomes unpredictable after consuming the brain of an irresponsible narcissist. Ravi suffers a major setback in the search for a cure. Peyton receives some shocking news.

7.title: Dirt Nap Time
7.plot: When Liv and Clive work together to solve the murder of a very charming, but womanizing, preschool teacher, things get interesting when they bring his jealous girlfriend Piper in for questioning. Meanwhile, Peyton is assigned a very interesting case. Lastly, Blaine finds himself in a bad situation.

8.title: Eat a Knievel
8.plot: Liv and her new boyfriend bond by sharing a daredevil's brain. Blaine returns to his old ways. Ravi's research produces a major breakthrough which puts Major in danger.

9.title: Twenty-Sided, Die
9.plot: A dungeon master is killed and the probe reveals that he was up to more than playing in his mother's basement. Meanwhile, Blaine's experiment does not go as planned; and Ravi stumbles across some new information that could prove deadly.

10.title: Return of the Dead Guy
10.plot: Liv and Peyton go on a wild goose chase. The zombie truthers real plan terrifies Ravi. Major finds comfort in an unexpected place.

11.title: Conspiracy Weary
11.plot: When Liv, Blaine and Don consume a zombie truther brain, paranoia follows. Liv reveals the truth about Major's new "friend". Ravi discovers something shocking.

12.title: Looking for Mr. Goodbrain, Part 1
12.plot: When Liv consumes the brains of someone from Ravi's past, she begins having some very intimate visions of him; Major faces a huge decision.

13.title: Looking for Mr. Goodbrain, Part 2
13.plot: Liv uncovers the shocking truth about the virus and the far-reaching consequences of the vaccine. Majors exams his future as a human. Blaine makes a business proposal.

locations: 210-555 Brooksbank Ave, Bld. 10 North Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Liv Moore, a medical student, gets invited in a party which turns into a macabre zombie arena. Liv wakes up from the dead and becomes a zombie. For maintaining her humanity she must eat human brains so she began working in coroner's office to access brains. Eating a brain gives her memories and traits of that person. So she helps detective Clive Babineaux to solve the murder as a psychic.
imdb.title: iZombie
plot: A medical resident finds that being a zombie has its perks, which she uses to assist the police.

Liv Moore, a medical student, gets invited in a party which turns into a macabre zombie arena. Liv wakes up from the dead and becomes a zombie. For maintaining her humanity she must eat human brains so she began working in coroner's office to access brains. Eating a brain gives her memories and traits of that person. So she helps detective Clive Babineaux to solve the murder as a psychic.::Awinash Singh

Liv Moore is a medical resident with a promising career and a fiancé, but when she goes to a boat party, things go horribly wrong. Liv gets turned into a zombie after getting scratched by one. Now, Liv has traded her job for a job at the morgue, broken off her engagement, and completely changed her life. At the morgue, after eating the brain of a murder victim, Liv gets visions that can be used to piece together her murder. But unable to share her true identity with her family and friends, Liv struggles.
